Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2008 10:47AM acar209 wrote: my mother has just completed her radiation and had shortness of breath and has a continued sore throat and dry cough, doctors of course say it is not related to any of her treatments . she never has suffered from allergies.  it really bothers her she just carries throat drops  and  water with her always.
